review.title: A Probabilistic Approach to Hierarchical Model-based Diagnosis
review.abstract: model - based diagnosis reasons backwards from a functional schematic of a system to isolate faults given observations of anomalous correlated behavior. we develop a fully probabilistic approach to both model functional based diagnosis and extend it to support hierarchical models. our analytic scheme translates the functional schematic into a bayesian network and diagnostic inference takes 2nd place in the typical bayesian monitoring network. a bayesian network diagnostic decision inference algorithm is modified to take ample advantage of the hierarchy to give computational gains.

metadata.abstractText: Model-based diagnosis reasons backwards from a functional schematic of a system to isolate faults given observations of anoma­ lous behavior. We develop a fully proba­ bilistic approach to model based diagno­ sis and extend it to support hierarchical models. Our scheme translates the func­ tional schematic into a Bayesian network and diagnostic inference takes place in the Bayesian network. A Bayesian network diagnostic inference algorithm is modified to take advantage of the hierarchy to give computational gains.
